fieldValuesJavadocs.CERTIFICATE: * CERTIFICATE: A file representing certifications or qualifications.
fieldValuesJavadocs.COVER_LETTER: * COVER_LETTER: Cover letter accompanying a job application.
fieldValuesJavadocs.CV: * CV: Curriculum Vitae or Resume file.
fieldValuesJavadocs.OTHER: * OTHER: Any other supporting documents that don't fall into the predefined categories.
fieldValuesJavadocs.PORTFOLIO: * PORTFOLIO: A file containing work samples, typically for creative fields.
fieldValuesJavadocs.RECOMMENDATION_LETTER: * RECOMMENDATION_LETTER: A letter of recommendation supporting the application.
fieldValuesJavadocs.TRANSCRIPT: * TRANSCRIPT: An academic transcript file showing grades and courses.
